mapper.select: select date_format(last_scan_date, '%Y-%m-%d')as date, count(*) as slide_sum from slide_list group by date order by date asc
select date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') as type, slide_sum as slide_sum from slide_per_date order by type asc
select date_format(date,'%Y-%m') as type, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date group by type order by type asc
select date_format(date,'%Y') as type, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date group by type order by type asc

select date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') as type, slide_sum as slide_sum from slide_per_date where date between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{finishDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by type asc

select date_format(date,'%Y-%m') as type, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date where date_format(date,'%Y-%m') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and date_format(#{finishDate}, '%Y-%m') group by type order by type asc

select date_format(date,'%Y') as type, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date where date_format(date,'%Y') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y') and date_format(#{finishDate}, '%Y') group by type order by type asc
select date_format(date,'%Y-%m') as month, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date group by month
select date_format(date,'%Y') as year, sum(slide_sum) as slide_sum from slide_per_date group by year
